model_outputs.question:

(B) Frankenstein
(C) Lolita

At the start of the semester, Alice has Ulysses, Bob has Frankenstein, and Claire has Lolita. 
After the first trade, Claire has Frankenstein and Bob has Lolita. 
After the second trade, Claire has Ulysses and Alice has Frankenstein. 
After the third trade, Claire has Frankenstein and Bob has Ulysses. 
Therefore, at the end of the semester, Bob has Ulysses. 
The answer is (A).
